### Contact Us

1. **City of Celina**
   City Hall
   142 N Ohio St
   Celina, TX 75009
   Phone:
   [(972) 382-2682](tel:972-382-2682)
   Fax: (972) 382-3736

   **City Hall Hours**
   Monday - Thursday
   7:30 AM - 5:30 PM
